data.DescriptionHtml:
A partially translucent, scaled tail uncoils from behind you and sweeps through the area, then vanishes as quickly as it appeared.
You evoke a dragon's tail that savagely sweeps through the space around you in a 10-foot radius, dealing 1d6 points of damage per level to all creatures that fail a Reflex saving throw and half that damage to creatures that succeed on the save.
Creatures that fail the Reflex save are also knocked prone.
Special: A dragonblooded character, or a character with the dragon type, casts this spell at +1 caster level.
data.Name: Tail Sweep
